original_text: (As it is written in the law of the Lord, Every male that openeth the womb shall be called holy to the Lord;)
korean_text: 이는 주의 율법에 쓴 바 첫 태에 처음 난 남자마다 주의 거룩한 자라 하리라 한 대로 아기를 주께 드리고

sentences.original_text: As it is written in the law of the Lord,
Every male that openeth the womb
shall be called holy to the Lord;
